comments.body: Here too please reduce the number of createStream versions.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -128,6 +221,42 @@ object ZeroMQUtils {
       implicitly[ClassTag[AnyRef]].asInstanceOf[ClassTag[T]]
     val fn =
       (x: Seq[ByteString]) => bytesToObjects.call(x.map(_.toArray).toArray).iterator().asScala
-    createStream[T](jssc.ssc, publisherUrl, subscribe, fn)
+    createStream[T](
+      jssc.ssc,
+      publisherUrl,
+      subscribe,
+      fn)
+  }
+
+  /**
+   * Create an input stream that receives messages pushed by a zeromq publisher.
